Name: The Traitors NZ
Title: The Traitors NZ
Desc: The Faithful become desperate to catch a Traitor after another murder; embarking on a mission.
LongDescription: The Faithful become desperate to catch a Traitor after another murder; the players embark on a mission with a game-changing prize up for grabs; with the victory line edging closer, the pressure is on to banish a Traitor.
